GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Word on the street is those recent <clr:0000>cave
formations <clr:ffff>have all sorts of fresh <clr:0000>ore
deposits <clr:ffff>inside!
When you find a<clr:0000> cave<clr:ffff>, I recommend giving
it a good look-see. Never know what ya
might find.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Precious <clr:0000>gems <clr:ffff>sell for a high price.<sp:5:0:0> If ya
end up with extra, take it to a shop and
sell it off!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting><clr:0000>Gems <clr:ffff>are worth more than money. They
can be used in other ways too. Like eatin'.

The cool <clr:0000>sapphire<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> The spicy <clr:0000>ruby<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>
Mmm. <sp:5:0:0>Just thinking about them and I'm
droolin' all over myself again.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey. You got any ore on ya? I'll tell ya
somethin' useful.

Anytime you've got extra ore janglin'
around, you might wanna visit a shop.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>In particular, shops pay a high price for
precious <clr:0000>gems<clr:ffff>.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>The rain will make poets of us all...<sp:0:4:0><snd:Humming>Pitter-patter, plop-plop, drippy-drippy
drip-drop.<sp:5:0:0> Sopping wet and juicy sweet
andâ€”<sp:5:0:0> ARGH! There I go AGAIN.
I can't stop thinking about the juicy
deliciousness of <clr:0000>opals<clr:ffff>! 

Splooshy, splashy, yum-yum.<sp:5:0:0> GAH, I want
to EAT one!<sp:5:1:0> No use!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Who am I kiddin'? I'm no poet. I'm just a
wet, hungry Goron...
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000><snd:TalkPositive><clr:ffff>I slapped a rock onto a <clr:0000>wooden stick<clr:ffff> and
had me a new <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>

Works a lot better than a rotted-out ol'
<clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff>, that's for sure.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy><clr:0000>Gems <clr:ffff>aren't just pretty little rocks,
ya know.

Take 'em to a shop to make easy money.
If you gather lots, you'll get rich quick.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Of course, that's not the only thing you
can do with gems.<sp:5:0:0> Take, for example...

The <clr:0000>sapphire<clr:ffff>! It's cool and pleasant on
the tongue.<sp:5:1:0> Or try a <clr:0000>ruby<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0> which offers a
tender and delicate warmth.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>Mmm...<sp:5:0:0> I'm drooling again.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>You're a BEAST! I think I saw that monster
shaking, it was so scared.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Sure wasn't expectin' that.<sp:5:1:0> The monsters
are good 'n' gone, yeah?
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The best rock roast around is served up
at a <clr:0000>restaurant <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Eldin <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>.

My brother, Boldon, is a regular <clr:0000>there<clr:ffff>,
so if you head there yourself, you might
run into him.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>If you do see him, tell him hi from me,
will ya?
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Hey...does it feel like the amount of <clr:0000>ore<clr:ffff>
has dwindled a lot lately?<sp:5:1:0> I wonder if it's
to do with the Upheaval...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Eh, but I've heard otherwise.<sp:0:4:0>I'VE heard that inside those recent <clr:0000>cave
formations<clr:ffff>, there's all sorts of new
<clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff>.
<snd:Think>You can make easy money selling rare
<clr:0000>gems <clr:ffff>off to shops,<sp:5:0:0> so it's common sense
to investigate a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>when you find one.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting><clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff> up to the northeast has really cooled
off. The climate there should be much
more doable for a Hylian such as yourself.
I know, because I'm from <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>,
which is out there!<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The economy there has been doing better
lately, too, with <clr:0000>gems cheaper than ever<clr:ffff>.
It's a great time to visit.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>I mighta been a little careless...<sp:5:1:0> But I'm
safe now, thanks to you.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thank you! I'm safe now, whew.<sp:5:0:0> Thought
that was gonna be the end of me!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey...don't it feel like it's been one weird
thing after another since <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>?

<sp:3:0:2:0300>The other day, my precious <clr:0000>hammer <clr:ffff>that
I've loved and cared for since...well, since
forever...just up and rotted!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It was beyond fixing, so I slapped a rock
onto a <clr:0000>wooden stick<clr:ffff> and had me a
new <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>It might not be pretty,<sp:5:0:0> but it beats a
rotten ol' <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff> any day of the week.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease>I was so scared...<sp:5:0:0> I thought that was the
end. But, wow, you sure can fight!<sp:5:1:0>
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>I'm from <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, which is in the <clr:0000>Eldin
region<clr:ffff> to the northeast. It's a nice place,
and the <clr:0000>gems there are so cheap<clr:ffff> now.
You should check it out!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>My brother, <clr:0000>Boldon<clr:ffff>, is a regular at the
restaurant that opened up in<clr:0000> Eldin<clr:ffff>.

If you happen to see <clr:0000>him<clr:ffff>, tell him hi from
me, will ya?
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>When I gaze upon the falling rain, all I can
think about is the juiciness of the <clr:0000>opal<clr:ffff>.

*sigh* I need to eat one immediately!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ack!<sp:5:0:0> This isn't good! This is...<sp:5:0:0>bad! I'm not
gonna make it!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>This one's strong...<sp:5:0:0> TOO strong.


I don't stand a chance. Better run!
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare>Agh! It's gonna get me!<sp:5:1:0> Somebody help!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I'm alive!<sp:5:1:0> What a relief.<sp:5:0:0> I thought I was
done for.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I could say thanks until my breath gave
out and it wouldn't be enough, so I want
you to have this.<sp:5:0:0>
Every time you look at it, you can hear me
in your mind, saying thanks!
